name: Witherspoon
description:
Its last orders at Witherspoons and you need to pee - get to the toilet!  Drink as many pints as you can on the way and extra points for whisky, although it's strong stuff and may make you wobble. Experience all the wonders of this British drinking establishment with authentic crazy alcoholics getting in your way, watch out for their puke! 

It's a daft game, made for a giggle. My first game attempt with no idea how to publish  etc - so any tips for my journey would be awesome!
